title: 29.地球三体运动
paragraphs: 竟然有这么多的人对人类文明彻底绝望，憎恨和背叛自己的物种，甚至将消灭包括自己和子孙在内的人类作为最高理想，这是地球三体运动最令人震惊之处。

地球三体叛军被称为精神贵族组织，其成员多来自高级知识阶层，也有相当一部分政界和经济界的精英。三体组织也曾试图在普通民众中发展成员，但这些努力都告失败。对于人类的负面，普通人并没有高级知识阶层那样全面深刻的认知；更重要的是，由于他们的思想受现代科学和哲学影响较少，对自己所属物种本能的认同感仍占强势地位，将人类作为一个整体来背叛，在他们看来是不可想象的。但知识精英们则不同，他们中相当多的人早已站在人类之外思考问题了。人类文明，终于在自己的内部孕育出了强大的异化力量。
三体叛军发展的速度固然惊人，但仅凭人数还不能衡量其力量，因为它的组织成员大部分处于社会的高层位置，有很大的权力和影响力。
作为地球三体叛军的最高统帅，叶文洁只是一名精神领袖，并不参与组织的具体运作，她不知道后来变得十分庞大的三体叛军是如何发展起来的，甚至不知道组织的具体人数。

对于地球三体叛军，各国政府一直没有给予足够的重视。为了迅速扩大，这个组织几乎是在半公开地活动，他们知道，有一样东西会成为他们的天然保护，那就是政府的保守和贫乏的想象力。在掌握国家力量的相关部门中，没有人相信他们说的那一套，只是将他们作为一般的胡言乱语的激进组织，由于其成员层次之高，各国政府对待这个组织一直小心翼翼。直到三体叛军开始发展自己的武装力量，一些国家的安全机构才注意到它，进而发现该组织非同寻常；至于开始对其进行有效打击，只是近两年的事。
地球三体叛军并非铁板一块，它的内部有着复杂的派别和分支，主要分为两部分：

降临派：这是三体叛军最本原最纯粹的一脉，主要由伊文斯物种共产主义的信奉者组成。他们对人类本性都已彻底绝望，这种绝望最初来源于现代文明导致的地球物种大灭绝，伊文斯就是其典型代表。后来，降临派对人类的憎恨开始有了不同的出发点，并非只局限于环保和战争等，有些上升到了相当抽象的哲学高度。与后来人们的想象不同，这些人大都是现实主义者，对于他们为之服务的外星文明也并未抱太多的期望，他们的背叛只源于对人类的绝望和仇恨，麦克。伊文斯的一句话已成为降临派的座右铭：我们不知道外星文明是什么样子，但知道人类。
拯救派：这是在三体叛军出现相当长的时间后才产生的一个派别，它本质上是一个宗教团体，由三体教的教徒组成。

人类之外的另一个文明，对于高级知识阶层无疑具有巨大的吸引力，并使他们极易对其产生种种美好的幻想。对于人类这样一个幼稚的文明，更高等的异种文明产生的吸引力几乎是不可抗拒的。有一个不太恰当的比喻：人类文明一直是一个孤独行走于宇宙荒漠中的不谙世事的少年，现在她（他）知道了另一个异性的存在，虽然看不到他（她）的面容和身影，但知道他（她）就在远方，对他（她）的美好想象便如同野火般蔓延。渐渐地，随着对那个遥远文明的想象越来越丰富，拯救派在精神上对三体文明产生了宗教感情，人马座三星成了太空中的奥林匹斯山，那是神的住所，三体教由此诞生。与人类的其他宗教不同，三体教崇拜着一个真实存在的对象；与其他宗教相反，处于危难中的是主，而负有拯救责任的是信徒。

向社会传播三体文化的途径主要是通过《三体》游戏。三体叛军投入巨大的力量开发这款规模庞大的游戏软件，最初的目的，一是三体教的一种传教手段；二是想通过它将一直局限于高知阶层的三体叛军的触角伸向社会的最基层，为组织招募处于社会中下层的更年轻的成员。游戏通过一层貌似人类社会和历史的外壳，演绎三体世界的历史和文化，这样可以避免人门者的陌生感。当游戏玩家深人到一定程度并感受三体文明的魅力后，三体组织将直接与其联系，考察其思想倾向，最终将合格者招募为地球三体叛军成员。但《三体》游戏在社会上并没有引起太大的关注，玩这个游戏需要层次很高的知识背景和深刻的思想，年轻的玩家们没有能力和耐心去透过它那看似平常的表层，发现其震撼人心的内幕。真正被它所吸引的，大多还是高知阶层的人。
拯救派后来加入的成员，大多都是通过《三体》游戏认识三体文明，最终投身于地球三体叛军的，可以说，《三体》游戏是拯救派的摇篮。

拯救派在对三体文明抱有宗教感情的同时，对于人类文明的态度远没有降临派那样极端，他们的最终理想就是拯救主。为了使主生存下去，可以在一定程度上牺牲人类世界。但他们中的大多数人认为，能够使主在三个太阳的半人马座星系生存下去，避免其对太阳系的人侵，是两全其美的理想结局。他们天真地以为，解决物理上的三体问题就能达到这一目标，同时拯救三体和地球两个世界。其实这一想法也未必天真，三体文明本身在相当漫长的时间里也抱有这个想法，解决三体问题的努力贯穿于三体文明的几百次轮回之中。拯救派中有较深物理学和数学背景的人，都有过解决三体问题的尝试，即使在得知三体问题从数学本质上不可解后，仍然没有停止努力，解决三体问题的努力已成为三体教的一种宗教仪式。虽然拯救派中不乏一流的物理学家和数学家，但这种研究一直没有重大成果，倒是像魏成这样与三体叛军和三体教无关的天才，无意中取得了令他们产生很大希望的突破。
降临派和拯救派一直处于尖锐的对立状态，降临派认为，拯救派是对地球三体运动重大的威胁。这种看法也不是没有道理，正是通过拯救派中一些有责任心的人士，各国政府才逐渐得知三体叛军令人震惊的背景。两派在组织中实力相当，双方的武装力量已经发展到兵戎相见的程度。叶文洁运用自己的威信极力弥合组织中的裂痕，但效果不大。

随着三体运动的发展，三体叛军中出现了第三个派别：幸存派。当人侵太阳系的外星舰队的存在被确切证实后，在那场终极战争中幸存下来是人们最自然的愿望。当然，战争是四百五十年之后的事了，与自己的此生无关，但很多人希望如果人类战败，自己在四个半世纪后的子孙能幸存下来。现在就为三体侵略者服务，显然有利于这个目标的实现。与另外两个主流派别比较，幸存派成员都来自较低的社会阶层，且东方人（特别是中国人）居多，他们目前的数量还很少，但人数在急剧增长，在三体文化日益普及的未来，将会成为一支不可忽视的力量。
人类文明自身缺陷产生的异化力量、对更高等文明的向往和崇拜、让子孙在终极战争后幸存的强烈欲·望，这三股强大的动力推动地球三体运动迅速发展，当它被察觉时，已成燎原之势。
而这时，外星文明还远在四光年之外的太空深处，与人类世界还隔着四个半世纪的漫漫航程，它们送到地球的，只有那一束电波。
比尔·马修的“接触符号”理论，得到了令人心悸的完美证实。

translated_paragraphs: It is shocking that there are so many people who have completely lost faith in human civilization, hate and betray their own species, and even see the destruction of human civilization, including themselves and their descendants, as the highest ideal. This is the most shocking aspect of the Three-body Movement on Earth.

The Three-body Rebel Army is known as the "Mind Noble Organization," with many members coming from the high-level intellectual class and a significant portion of political and economic elites. The Three-body Organization also attempted to develop members among the general population, but these efforts were all unsuccessful. For humans, the negative is not as comprehensive and profound as that of the intellectual class; more importantly, because their thoughts are influenced less by modern science and philosophy, their sense of belonging to their own species' instincts still holds sway, and the idea of betraying humanity as a whole is unimaginable to them. However, intellectuals are different. A considerable number of them have long been thinking outside the box. Human civilization has finally孕育ed powerful alienation forces within itself.

The speed of the Three Body Rebel Army's development is indeed remarkable, but it is not enough to measure its power solely based on the number of people, because most of its members are in high-level positions in society, with great power and influence.

As the highest commander of the Three Body Rebels, Ye Wenjie was only a spiritual leader and did not participate in the specific operations of the organization. She had no idea how the very large Three Body Rebels had developed later, and even did not know the exact number of people in the organization.

For the Earth Three-body Rebel Army, governments around the world have not given it enough attention. In order to expand rapidly, this organization has been operating semi-openly, knowing that there is something that will become their natural protection: the conservatism and lack of imagination of governments. In the departments in charge of national power, no one believes what they say, but only regards them as a radical organization with wild talk. Due to the high level of its members, governments have treated this organization with great caution. It was only when the Three-body Rebel Army began to develop its own armed forces that some national security agencies began to notice it, and then discovered that the organization was extraordinary; as for starting effective attacks against it, it was only in the past two years.
The Three-body Rebel Army is not a monolithic entity, and it has complex factions and branches within it. It is mainly divided into two parts:

The Arrival Party: This is the most fundamental and pure branch of the Three Body Rebellion, mainly composed of believers of the species communist ideology of the Ives race. They have completely lost faith in human nature, which originated from the great extinction of Earth species caused by modern civilization, with Ives being a typical representative. Later, the hatred of the Arrival Party for humanity had different starting points, not limited to environmental protection and war, but some reached a very abstract philosophical height. Different from people's imagination later, these people were mostly realists, and they did not have too much hope for the extraterrestrial civilization they served. Their betrayal was only based on despair and hatred for humanity. Michael Ives' words have become the motto of the Arrival Party: We don't know what the extraterrestrial civilization is like, but we know humans.

Rescue Party: This is a faction that emerged a considerable amount of time after the emergence of the Three Body Rebels. In essence, it is a religious group composed of believers of the Three Body religion.

Another civilization outside human society undoubtedly has a huge attraction for the intelligentsia, and makes it easy for them to indulge in various beautiful illusions. For such a childish civilization as human beings, the attraction of a more advanced alien civilization is almost irresistible. There is an inappropriate metaphor: human civilization has always been a foolish child wandering alone in the vast wilderness of the universe, and now she (he) knows the existence of another gender. Although she (he) cannot see his (her) face or figure, she (he) knows that he (she) is far away, and her (his) beautiful imagination spreads like wildfire. Gradually, with the richer and richer imagination of the distant civilization, the salvation party developed a religious feeling towards the Trisolaran civilization, and the three stars of the constellation Centaurus became the Mount Olympus of space, which was the residence of gods. Different from other religions, the Trisolaran religion worships a real existence object; on the contrary, it is the believers who are in danger, and the believers who are responsible for salvation.

The main way to spread the culture of Three Body is through the Three Body game. The Three Body rebels invested a huge amount of effort to develop this massive software game. The original purpose was to use it as a传教 tool for the Three Body teachings, and to extend the触角 of the Three Body rebels, who had been confined to the high-end阶层, to the grassroots of society and recruit younger members for the organization. The game uses a layer of seemingly human society and history to perform a historical and cultural performance of the Three Body world, which can avoid the unfamiliarity of players. When players delve into the game to a certain extent and feel the charm of Three Body civilization, the Three Body organization will directly contact them to examine their ideological倾向, and finally recruit qualified members as Earth Three Body rebels. However, the Three Body game has not attracted much attention in society. Playing this game requires a high level of knowledge background and profound thinking. Young players lack the ability and patience to penetrate through its seemingly ordinary surface layer to discover its shocking inner secrets. Those who are truly attracted to it are mostly people with high levels of knowledge.

Members who joined the salvation faction later were mostly introduced to the Trisolaris civilization through the game "Three Body," and eventually joined the Earth Three-body Rebellion. In other words, the "Three Body" game can be regarded as the cradle of the salvation faction.

The salvagers have a religious attitude towards the Three-body civilization while their attitude towards human civilization is not as extreme as that of the arrival sect. Their ultimate goal is to save the Lord. In order to save the Lord, they are willing to make sacrifices to some extent to the human world. However, most of them believe that it is a perfect ideal outcome to allow the Lord to survive in the Three Suns System of the half-human Centauri constellation, avoiding its invasion of the Solar System, and that this can be achieved to some extent by sacrificing the human world. They foolishly believe that solving the Three-body problem can achieve this goal, while saving both the Three-body and Earth worlds. In fact, this idea may not be foolish. The Three-body civilization itself had this idea for a very long time and had been trying to solve the Three-body problem throughout its hundreds of cycles of reincarnation. There are people with deep physical and mathematical backgrounds in the salvagers who have made attempts to solve the Three-body problem, even after realizing that the Three-body problem is fundamentally unsolvable from a mathematical point of view. The effort to solve the Three-body problem has become a religious ceremony in the Three-body religion. Although there are many outstanding physicists and mathematicians among the salvagers, this kind of research has never produced major results. It was天才魏成这样与三体叛军和三体教无关的人无意中取得了令他们产生很大希望的突破。

The arrival sect and the salvation sect have been in a state of sharp confrontation for a long time. The arrival sect believes that the salvation sect is a major threat to the Earth Three-body Movement. This point of view is not without reason. It was through some responsible individuals in the salvation sect that governments of various countries gradually learned the shocking background of the Three-body rebels. Both factions have equal strength in the organization, and both sides' armed forces have developed to the point of being at odds with each other. Ye Wenjie used her authority to try to heal the cracks in the organization, but with little effect.

With the development of the Three-body movement, a third faction emerged within the Three-body rebels: the幸存派. When the existence of the extraterrestrial fleet invading the solar system was confirmed, it was the most natural wish for people to survive in the ultimate war. Of course, the war was four and a half centuries later, and had nothing to do with their own lives, but many people hoped that if humanity lost, their descendants four and a half centuries later could survive. Now serving the Three-body Invaders is obviously beneficial to achieving this goal. Compared with the two mainstream factions, members of the幸存派 come from lower social classes, and East Asians (especially Chinese) are dominant, and their numbers are still small, but they are growing rapidly, and in the future, when Three-body culture becomes more popular, they will become a force that cannot be ignored.

The three powerful driving forces of the human civilization's inherent defects, the longing for a higher civilization and worship, and the strong desire to survive for descendants after the ultimate war, propel the Earth Three-Body Movement to develop rapidly. When it is detected, it has already become a raging fire.

And at this time, the alien civilization was still far away in the depths of outer space, four light-years away from the human world, and隔着 four and a half centuries of oceanic journey, the only thing they sent to Earth was that beam of light.
Bill Mathew's "contact symbol" theory has received a terrifyingly perfect confirmation.

Within departments in charge of national power, no one believes what they say, only treating them as a kind of wild talk radical organization, because of their high-level members, governments have always treated this organization with caution. Until the Three Body Rebel Army began to develop its own armed forces, some national security agencies noticed it, and then found that this organization was extraordinary; as for starting to effectively combat it, it was only two years ago.
The Three Body Rebellion is not a monolithic entity, it has complex factions and branches within it, mainly divided into two parts:

The Invaders: This is the most original and pure branch of the Three-Body Rebellion, mainly composed of believers in communist beliefs of the Eveons. They have completely lost faith in human nature, which originated from the large-scale extinction of Earth species caused by modern civilization, and Eveon is a typical representative. Later, the hatred of the Invaders towards humanity began to take on different starting points, not only limited to environmental protection and war, but also some abstract philosophical heights. Different from what people imagined later, these people were mostly realists, and they did not expect their alien civilization very much for which they served. Their betrayal was only because of despair and hatred towards humans, and the words of Michael Eveon became a mottos of the Invaders: We do not know what kind of extraterrestrial civilization it is, but we know humans.

Salvation Sect: This is a sect that emerged after a very long time when rebels appeared in the Three Body Rebellion. In essence, it is a religious group composed of believers in the Three-Body Religion.

Another civilization beyond human beings undoubtedly holds great attraction for the elite of advanced knowledge and makes it easy for them to indulge in various beautiful daydreams. For a childish civilization like humanity, the attraction of an even higher alien civilization is almost irresistible. There's a somewhat inappropriate metaphor: humanity has always been a naive youth wandering alone in the vast wasteland of the universe, now she (he) knows that there is another alien existence, though she (he) cannot see his (her) face or figure, but knows he (she) is somewhere far away, with a wealth of imagination about him (her). Gradually, as imagination about this distant civilization becomes more and more abundant, the salvation party developed religious feelings in their minds towards the Trisolaran civilization. The stars of Centaurus became Mount Olympus in space, the abode of gods; hence, the religion of the Three-body was born. Different from other religions, the Three-Body religion worshiped an actual object; unlike other religions, the one in danger is the master, while those who bear the responsibility of salvation are believers.

The main way of spreading the culture of Three-Body to society is through the game "Three-Body". The Three-Body rebels have invested huge efforts in developing this massive computer game software, with the initial purpose of not only being a missionary tool for the Three-Body cult but also to extend their触角 into society's lower levels and recruit younger members who are at the bottom of society. Through a layer of human society and history shell that seems like a cover, the game depicts the history and culture of the Three-Body world, which can avoid players' unfamiliarity. When gamers get deep enough into the game and feel the魅力 of the Three-Body civilization, the Three-Body organization will directly contact them, examine their thought tendencies, and finally recruit qualified ones as members of the Earth Three-Body rebels. However, the game "Three-Body" has not attracted much attention in society. To play it requires a high level of knowledge background and profound thoughts, and young players do not have the ability or patience to dig deeper than its seemingly ordinary surface to discover its shocking inner truth. People who were truly attracted to it were mostly those with high levels of education.

Members who joined the Save the Earth later were mostly familiar with the Trisolarans through the game, and eventually joined the Earth Three-body Rebellion, which can be said that the Trisolaran game is the cradle of Save the Earth.

The salvagers, while having a religious sentiment towards the Three-body Civilization, do not hold as extreme an attitude towards human civilization. Their ultimate ideal is to save the Lord. In order to save the Lord, they can sacrifice some of the human world to a certain extent. But most of them believe that, in order to let the Lord survive in the three suns of the Sagittarius Armillary System, and avoid its invasion of the solar system, it is the best possible outcome that the two worlds can be saved at the same time. They naively believe that solving the physical Three-body problem can achieve this goal and simultaneously save both the Three-body and Earth worlds. In fact, this idea may not be naive. The Three-body Civilization itself has held this idea for a very long time, and efforts to solve the Three-body problem have been ongoing throughout hundreds of cycles of the Three-body Civilization. There are people with deeper backgrounds in physics and mathematics among the salvagers, who have all tried to solve the Three-body problem. Even after learning that the Three-body problem cannot be solved mathematically at its core, they did not stop their efforts and solving the Three-body problem had become a religious ceremony in the Three-body Cult. Although there are many outstanding physicists and mathematicians among the salvagers, this research has not made any major breakthroughs. It was by accident that Wei Cheng, who had nothing to do with the Three-body Rebellion and the Three-body Cult, achieved great hope in their eyes.

The arrival faction and salvation faction have been in a sharp dispute, with the arrival faction believing that the salvation faction is a major threat to the Earth Three-Body Movement. This view is not without reason, it was through some responsible individuals within the salvation faction that governments around the world gradually learned of the shocking background of the Three-body rebel army. The strength of both factions in the organization is relatively equal, and their armed forces have developed to the point where they are on the verge of open warfare. Ye Wenyi used her own authority to try to mend the cracks in the organization, but the results were not significant.

With the development of the Three-body Movement, a third faction has emerged in the Three-body rebels: The survivalists. When the existence of an extraterrestrial fleet invading the solar system was confirmed, it became the most natural wish for people to survive the ultimate war. Of course, this is hundreds of years after the war, and has nothing to do with their own lives, but many people hope that if human beings lose, their descendants four and a half centuries later can survive. Now serving the Three-body invaders is clearly conducive to achieving this goal. Compared to the two mainstream factions, members of the survivalist faction come from lower social classes and are predominantly Easterners (especially Chinese), with a small number currently, but rapidly growing numbers, and in the future when the Three-body culture becomes more popular, they will become an unstoppable force.

The superhuman alien civilization left behind by the previous generation of advanced civilizations is in the form of a three-body system, and it will eventually move to Earth. The three strong powers - the defect of human civilization itself, the longing and worship for higher civilizations, and the strong desire for子孙 to survive in the ultimate war - have driven the development of Three-Body movement on Earth quickly, when it was discovered, it had already become a bushfire.

And at that time, the alien civilization was still in the vast depths of space more than four light-years away from the human world, with a distant and endless journey of four and a half centuries separating them, and what they delivered to the earth was only one electromagnetic wave.
Bill Matthew's "contact symbol" theory has been perfectly verified, sending shivers down people's spines.
cn_summaries_qwen_7b_chat: 这段话描绘了一种极端的思想，表达了某些人对人类文明的失望和敌意，以及他们对消灭所有人类的极端想法。这种思想是不道德的，也是不可接受的。我们应该团结一致，共同努力保护我们的家园——地球。

这段文字描述了地球三体叛军的精神贵族组织的构成，包括由高级知识阶层和政界、经济界的精英组成，并且尝试发展普通民众中的成员，但是这些努力都未能成功。由于普通民众没有高级知识阶层那样全面深刻的认识，以及受到现代科学和哲学的影响较少，因此将人类作为一个整体来背叛的想法对他们来说是无法想象的。然而，知识精英们却以不同的方式思考问题，他们中有相当多的人已经站在人类之外思考问题。最终，人类文明在自己的内部孕育出强大的异化力量。
三体叛军以令人惊讶的速度发展，但是它们的力量并非仅由人数来衡量，而是依赖于组织中大部分成员处在社会高层的职位以及他们所拥有的大量权力和影响力。
好的，我已经明白了您的要求。
这段文字主要描述了地球三体叛军的发展过程，以及各国政府对此的态度。从一开始，各国政府就对这个组织没有给予足够的重视，甚至将其视为普通的激进组织，但随着三体叛军发展自己的武装力量，一些国家的安全机构才注意到它，并采取了一些有效的措施来打击它。
一部分是主战派，他们坚决支持三体人征服地球；另一部分是反战派，他们认为应该与地球文明和平共处。此外，还有小部分中间派，他们在两派之间摇摆不定，但最终大多数人都站在反战派一边。

降临派是三体叛军中最本质、最纯粹的一支，主要由伊文斯物种共产主义的信徒组成，他们彻底失望于人类本性，这种绝望最初来自于现代文明导致的地球物种大灭绝，伊文斯就是其典型代表。后来，降临派对人类的恨意有了新的出发点，并不局限于环保和战争等，而上升到了相当抽象的哲学高度。与人们想象的不同，这些人大多都是现实主义者，对他们为之服务的外星文明也并未抱太大的期望，他们的背叛只源于对人类的绝望和恨意。麦克·伊文斯的一句话已成为降临派的座右铭：“我们不知道外星文明是什么样子，但知道人类。”
是的，你描述得非常正确。拯救派是由三体教的信徒组成的宗教团体，在三体叛军出现一段时间之后才形成。他们坚信可以通过信仰来拯救人类，并认为三体文明就是他们的救世主。

根据上述描述，可以总结出如下内容：

人类之外的另一个文明，对于高级知识阶层有着巨大的吸引力，并且这种吸引力是不可抗拒的。三体文明的存在激发了人们对它的美好想象，形成了三体教。三体教是一种与人类其他宗教不同的宗教，它崇拜着一个真实存在的对象，并且认为处在危险中的是主，而负有拯救责任的是信徒。
中国社会传播三体文化的最主要的途径是《三体》游戏，游戏开发者想利用这款游戏作为一种传教工具以及宣传三体文化的方式。这款游戏的设计巧妙地融入了人类社会和历史元素，以此来帮助玩家更好地理解三体世界，从而减少陌生感。然而，《三体》游戏并未得到广泛的社会关注，大部分年轻玩家无法深入其中，发现其内在的震撼性内容。真正被这款游戏吸引的，大多是具有较高知识背景和深刻思想的玩家。
拯救派后来的成员大多数都是通过《三体》游戏认识三体文明，并最终投身于地球三体叛军的。因此，可以说，《三体》游戏是拯救派的摇篮。
拯救派是一个信仰人类应该拯救外星文明（三体文明）的宗教组织，他们主张为让三体文明存活，人类可以牺牲自己的文明。然而，在他们内部也存在不同的意见，其中大多数人都认为拯救三体文明以及地球都是理想的结局。尽管人类已经知道三体问题无法通过物理学或数学的方法来解决，但是很多科学家还是不放弃，他们认为三体问题的解决可能会带来意外的结果。在这个过程中，一位叫魏成的人偶然发现了解决问题的新方法，给了人们希望。
降临派和拯救派之间的矛盾日益加剧。降临派认为拯救派是一个威胁，而拯救派则将降临派视为一种威胁。随着更多的人了解到三体叛军的惊人背景，两国政府开始采取措施。然而，在组织中，降临派与拯救派的实力相当，甚至发生了军事冲突。叶文洁试图缓和局势，但是没有取得明显成效。
本文描述了一个三体叛军中的第三派系——幸存派，他们在人类即将入侵太阳系的背景下，为了确保自身的后代能够生存而选择加入到反抗侵略者的队伍中来。这些幸存派成员来自社会底层，主要为东方人，数量虽然不多，但是正在快速增长，并有可能在未来成为一个强大的力量。
这段文字描述了人类文明自身缺陷带来的异化力量，以及对更高等文明的向往和崇拜这两股动力，最终推动地球三体运动快速发展的历史背景。
是的，尽管外星文明可能比我们更早地发展出先进的技术和文明，但与人类之间的交流却受到距离和时差的限制。
